content: Ali Mili | People Skip to main content Home Profile Ali Mili Professor, Computer Science Associate Dean for Academic Affairs ali.mili@njit.edu 973-596-5215 5700 Guttenberg Information Technologies Center (GITC) About Me PhD from the University of Illinois, Doctorat es Sciences d'Etat from the University of Grenoble. Currently on the CS Faculty at NJIT. Taught/ worked at several universities around the world, including Algeria (Oran, Algiers), Austria (Klagenfurt), Australia (Adelaide, Brisbane), Canada (Ottawa, Montreal, Quebec), China (ShangHai, Harbin), France (Grenoble), Sudan (Khartoum), Tunisia (Tunis), USA (SEI/CMU, Texas A&M, UT Arlington, WVU). Interested in software engineering, notably program correctness, program repair, software testing.
